title: Senior Media Production Manager - Global E-Commerce (Total Annual Compensation Up To $40,000)
job_description:
We are a rapidly growing global e-commerce brand seeking an exceptional leader to build and develop our Media Department from the ground up. This key position will be responsible for creating a high-volume, high-quality content production engine focused on driving performance marketing results across Facebook Ads and TikTok platforms.
As Head of Media Production, you will lead the development of our in-house media team responsible for producing high-converting ad creative at scale. You'll oversee the entire content production lifecycle while working closely with our Performance Marketing team to continuously improve ad performance metrics.
Build and lead a high-performing media team including video editors, content strategists, and UGC coordinators
Establish efficient content production workflows capable of delivering quality video ads monthly
Develop creative direction aligned with performance marketing objectives
Analyze ad performance data to refine creative strategy
Optimize production costs while maintaining quality standards
Manage production resources, budget, and timeline effectively
Collaborate with Performance Marketing to maximize ROAS across platforms
requirements:
3-5 years experience in digital content production, preferably in e-commerce or performance marketing
Proven track record of building and leading creative teams
Deep understanding of Facebook and TikTok ad creative best practices
Strong project management skills with ability to handle multiple deadlines
Data-driven mindset with experience in creative performance analysis
Experience working in fast-paced environments with high volume output
Excellent communication and leadership skills
Fluent English proficiency
